page.title: 10Farming A year's diary
page.content: We had a potato quota of six and a half acres but actually grew 8 acres so levy to Potato Marketing Board cost Â£500. Potato blight was bad because of wet weather so had to spray every 10 days for 60 days at Â£100 a time. Happily escaped blight and finished lifting potatoes on 5 October. Total cost to grow potatoes Â£900 per acre. Harvest 20 tons per acre. Wholesale price Â£40 per ton - Â£800 per acre. Considering labour involved potatoes have not paid this year. May buy in store sheep off fell land to over-winter and fatten for spring.
